content:
# I successfully crafted one wooden chest and now have 10 wood remaining in my inventory. 
# This is a good start, as having a storage solution will help me manage resources more effectively.

# Next, I will place the wooden chest in the environment to store any additional resources I may gather.

# First, I need to determine a suitable location for placing the wooden chest.

# Let's check the current position of the player and place the chest nearby.
player_position = get_player_position()
place_entity(Prototype.WoodenChest, player_position)  # Placing the wooden chest at the player's current position
print(f"Entities after placing the chest: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the entities after placing the chest
